HP_404: No help available for this module
HP_MTG:
*Muting*

Short but efficient commands to silence those who deserve to be.

* __Commands__ *

/mute - Reply this to a member's message to mute them, for a specific time or indefinitely.

/unmute - Reply this to a member's message to unmute them.
HP_LNG:
*Language*

Localisation module in order to make Zuli more understood by setting languages

*__Commands__*

/setlang - Use this to change personal or group language for me
MTG_ERR_REP: Reply to the user's message with /mute
MTG_ERR_SLF: I will not mute myself, thank you.
MTG_ERR_ADM: I can't mute an admin, unfortunately.
MTG_ERR_PRM:
If you can't do it, I can't
You'll need permission: `{permission_required}`
MTG_ERR_UNMUTE_SLF: I was probably not muted if you can see this.
HP_GRT:
*Greeting*

Warmly welcome new group members, or farewell the old ones

__ *Commands* __
/setgreeting `{greeting}` - Sets the greeting message for a group

/setfarewell `{farewell}` = Sets the farewell message for a group
